title: Solid Wood Wall Panels
detail_text: Enhance your space with our premium solid wood wall panels, crafted from high-quality timber for a natural, elegant look. These panels are designed to bring warmth and sophistication to any room, making them ideal for living areas, bedrooms, or offices. Their durable construction ensures long-lasting beauty, while the rich grain patterns add a unique touch to your decor. Easy to install and maintain, they offer a timeless solution for upgrading your interior design.

title: Dining table
detail_text: A sturdy and stylish dining table, perfect for family gatherings and dinner parties. Crafted with high-quality materials, this table offers ample space for large meals and entertaining guests. Its sleek design complements both modern and traditional interiors, adding a focal point to your dining area. The robust construction ensures durability, while the smooth finish makes it easy to clean and maintain for years of use.

title: Sofa bed
detail_text: A versatile sofa bed that combines comfort and functionality, ideal for small spaces. This dual-purpose piece transforms effortlessly from a cozy sofa into a spacious bed, perfect for overnight guests. Upholstered in durable, soft fabric, it offers plush seating during the day and a supportive sleeping surface at night. Its compact design saves space without compromising style, making it a practical addition to any home.

title: Fence Main Gate
detail_text: A durable and secure main gate for your fence, designed to enhance your property's entrance. Constructed with robust materials, this gate provides excellent protection while adding a welcoming aesthetic to your home. Its weather-resistant finish ensures longevity, even in harsh conditions, and the sturdy locking mechanism offers peace of mind. Perfect for both residential and commercial properties, it blends security with style seamlessly.

title: Side Table
detail_text: A sleek side table to complement your living space, perfect for lamps or decor. Crafted with a minimalist design, this table fits effortlessly beside sofas or chairs, adding both functionality and elegance. Its sturdy build supports a variety of items, from books to decorative pieces, while the smooth surface is easy to wipe down. Available in multiple finishes, it adapts to any interior style with ease.

title: Cast Aluminium
detail_text: Elegant cast aluminium furniture, combining durability with a modern aesthetic. This lightweight yet strong material resists rust and corrosion, making it ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. The intricate designs add a touch of sophistication, while the low maintenance requirements save you time. Perfect for patios, gardens, or living rooms, this furniture enhances any setting with its contemporary appeal.

title: Foam Ceramics
detail_text: Foamed ceramics are a type of lightweight, porous ceramic material made by high-temperature sintering. Their internal structure resembles a “foam,” hence the name. During manufacture, a foaming agent (e.g., carbonates, sulfates) is added to the ceramic powder; when fired, the agent decomposes and releases gas, creating uniform closed- or open-cell pores throughout the body.

title: Solid Wood Wall Panels
detail_text: Solid wood wall panels are wall cladding materials made from natural timber, processed through drying, cutting, polishing, and shaping. These panels retain the original wood grain and color, offering a warm and organic look and feel, perfect for upscale homes, commercial interiors, and cultural spaces.

title: Aluminum / stainless steel Mosaic
detail_text: Aluminum mosaic is a decorative material made from small pieces of aluminum that are pieced together. It is commonly used for wall, floor, swimming pool, kitchen, bathroom, and other areas of decoration. Aluminum mosaics are lightweight, durable, and corrosion-resistant, with a unique metallic sheen that adds a modern and artistic touch to any space. They come in various colors, shapes, and designs, making them widely used in both indoor and outdoor decoration.

title: Soft porcelain flexible tiles

title: Oven
detail_text: A oven is a kitchen appliance used for baking, roasting, and cooking food. It generates heat using electric heating elements or gas to cook food at high temperatures. Ovens are widely used in home kitchens, restaurants, and bakeries.

title: Dishwasher
detail_text: A dishwasher is a kitchen appliance that automatically cleans dishes, cookware, and glassware using high-temperature water, detergent, and spray technology. It efficiently removes grease, food residues, and provides drying and sanitization functions.

title: Refrigerator
detail_text: Refrigerators can be classified based on structure, usage

title: Floor Lamp
detail_text: Floor lamps come in various styles, designs, and functionalities.

title: Lighting Switch
detail_text: A Lighting Switch is a device used to control lighting circuits, commonly found in homes, offices, and commercial spaces. It can turn lights on or off through physical buttons, touch, remote control, or smart technology.

title: Outdoor wall lamp
detail_text: An outdoor wall lamp is a lighting fixture designed for use on the exterior walls of homes, buildings, or outdoor spaces. These lamps are specifically made to withstand outdoor elements, such as rain, wind, and varying temperatures. Outdoor wall lamps are commonly used for illuminating entryways, patios, gardens, or to enhance the overall ambiance of a property while ensuring safety and security at night.

title: Track Light
detail_text: Track lighting is a versatile and modern lighting system that consists of a track (usually mounted to the ceiling) with multiple light fixtures that can be adjusted along the track to focus light in different directions. It’s a popular choice for both residential and commercial spaces due to its flexibility, aesthetic appeal, and ability to highlight specific areas or objects.

title: Chandelier
detail_text: Chandeliers are lighting fixtures suspended from the ceiling that provide illumination and serve as decorative elements in interior spaces. Chandeliers can be used in various settings, including living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms, and commercial spaces.

title: Aluminum Ceiling
detail_text: Aluminum profile ceilings are a type of ceiling material made from aluminum alloys through processes such as extrusion, cutting, and surface treatment. They are widely used in modern environments like commercial buildings, office spaces, and transportation hubs. Aluminum profile ceilings are popular due to their lightweight, corrosion-resistant, flexible design, and easy installation. Common forms include aluminum curtain walls, aluminum strip ceilings, aluminum grid ceilings, and aluminum clip-in ceilings.

title: Cabinet Accessorie
detail_text: Cabinet accessories are components used to enhance the functionality, organization, and aesthetics of cabinets. These accessories help optimize storage space and improve convenience.

title: Modern Kitchen Cabinetry
detail_text: Designing Your Dream Kitchen: Modern Solutions for Home Cooking Spaces and plan your kitchen cabinet design layout

title: Polished Glazed Tile
detail_text: Polished glazed tile (Full Polished Glazed Tile) is a type of tile that has a glazed surface and undergoes a polishing process. It combines the rich patterns of glazed tiles with the smooth, glossy finish of polished tiles. This makes it both aesthetically appealing and functional, widely used in residential and commercial spaces.

title: Rustic Tiles
detail_text: Rustic tile is a type of ceramic or porcelain tile designed to imitate the look of natural stone, wood, or aged materials. It is characterized by a matte or textured surface, offering a vintage, classic, or industrial aesthetic. Rustic tiles are widely used in home and commercial spaces to create a warm, natural, and elegant atmosphere.

title: Velvet Tiles
detail_text: Velvet tile is a type of tile with a unique surface treatment, characterized by a soft and delicate texture similar to velvet. It is typically produced with special glazing techniques that give the tile a smooth, subtle gloss, while also providing strong stain resistance. Due to its unique tactile and visual effects, velvet tiles are often used in high-end and creative interior designs.

title: Mosaic
detail_text: Mosaic tiles are decorative materials made up of small pieces of tiles arranged together, commonly used for wall and floor decoration.

title: SPC Wood Flooring
detail_text: SPC wood flooring (Stone Plastic Composite Wood Flooring) is a type of rigid core vinyl flooring that combines natural limestone powder, PVC, and stabilizers to create a durable and resilient flooring material. It mimics the appearance of traditional wood floors but offers superior durability, water resistance, and ease of maintenance. SPC flooring is often used in residential and commercial spaces for its ability to withstand heavy traffic and its ability to handle moisture-prone areas.

title: Solid Wood Flooring
detail_text: Solid wood flooring is a type of flooring made from a single piece of natural wood throughout its entire thickness. It is typically cut from hardwood trees like oak, maple, or walnut, offering a timeless and durable flooring solution. Solid wood flooring is known for its natural beauty, longevity, and ability to be sanded and refinished multiple times to restore its appearance.

title: Full body tiles
detail_text: Marble Through-Body Tile is a type of porcelain tile that mimics the appearance of marble. Its main feature is that the color and pattern are consistent throughout the entire tile, from the surface to the interior. Unlike traditional glazed tiles, the color and texture of marble through-body tiles run through the entire tile, meaning even if the surface wears down or is damaged, the interior will maintain the same color and pattern. This makes it highly durable and aesthetically pleasing.

title: Wood floor parquet
detail_text: Wood flooring is not only a part of home décor but also a symbol of quality living—whether it's solid wood flooring, engineered wood flooring, or PVC flooring...

title: Sintered stone

title: Sauna Room / Far Infrared Sauna Room
detail_text: A far infrared ray room is a wellness device that uses far-infrared heating technology. It directly acts on the human body through far-infrared radiation to warm the body, relieve stress, and improve health.

title: Shower Flooring
detail_text: Shower Flooring refers to the flooring materials specifically designed for shower areas, with the primary purpose of providing water resistance, durability, ease of cleaning, and safety. The choice of shower flooring significantly impacts both the overall bathroom design and user experience. The right shower flooring material not only enhances the aesthetics of the bathroom but also ensures a dry, non-slip, and durable surface during use.

title: Massage Bathtub
detail_text: A massage bathtub (Whirlpool Bathtub / Hot Tub) is a bathtub equipped with a hydrotherapy system that uses water jets and air bubbles to provide a relaxing and therapeutic bathing experience. It helps relieve fatigue, relax muscles, and enhance overall comfort during bathing.

title: Bathtub
detail_text: A bathtub is a large container used for bathing, typically filled with water for soaking. It is a common fixture in bathrooms and is designed to provide a comfortable and relaxing bathing experience.

title: Shower Room
detail_text: A shower room is a dedicated space in a bathroom specifically designed for showering. Unlike a traditional bathtub, a shower room typically features a shower area with a water-tight enclosure or cubicle, often separated by glass or a shower curtain to prevent water from spilling into the rest of the bathroom.

title: Toilet
detail_text: Toilets come in various types based on design, flushing mechanism, and installation method.

title: Swimming pool
detail_text: swimming pool, massage pool, pool pump, and pool cover are all essential components for creating a relaxing and enjoyable outdoor oasis. Make sure to invest in quality products and accessories to ensure your swimming pool remains a place of fun and relaxation for years to come.

title: Wash Basin
detail_text: A wash basin (also known as a sink or lavatory) is a plumbing fixture used for washing hands, face, and other small tasks. It typically includes a basin or bowl, a faucet for water supply, and a drain for wastewater. Wash basins are commonly found in bathrooms, kitchens, and sometimes in utility areas.

title: Floor Paint
detail_text: Floor Paint is a type of coating specifically designed for application on floors, intended to provide protection, decoration, and enhance the durability of the surface. Floor paint is commonly used on various types of floors, including concrete, wood, metal, and other materials. It improves the floor's wear resistance, stain resistance, slip resistance, and water resistance, and is widely used in industrial, commercial, and residential settings.

title: Waterproof Paint
detail_text: Waterproof paint is a type of coating designed to prevent water penetration or entry into the surface of a building, protecting walls, floors, or other structures from water damage. It is typically used in areas that require waterproof protection, such as exterior walls, basements, roofs, bathrooms, kitchens, and more. The main feature of waterproof paint is its ability to form a dense waterproof film on the surface, effectively blocking water, preventing penetration, mold growth, corrosion, and other issues.

title: Interior Wall Paint
detail_text: Interior Wall Paint is a type of paint specifically designed for use on the interior walls of buildings. Its primary functions are decoration, protection of the walls, and providing color and texture effects. Unlike exterior wall paint, interior wall paint mainly aims to enhance the aesthetics of indoor spaces while offering features like stain resistance, washability, and ease of cleaning.

title: Exterior Wall Paint
detail_text: Exterior Wall Paint is a type of paint specifically designed for use on the exterior walls of buildings. It serves both decorative and protective functions, enhancing the appearance of a building while providing protection against various environmental factors. Exterior wall paint is formulated to withstand weather conditions such as wind, rain, and sunlight, ensuring long-lasting durability.

title: Track System / Accessories
detail_text: Curtain Accessories Categories:Curtain Track、Rollers/Sliders、Track Brackets

title: Blinds
detail_text: Blinds are a common type of window covering, typically consisting of many parallel horizontal slats or strips that can be adjusted to control the amount of light entering and to provide privacy. The materials used for blinds are usually wood, aluminum, PVC plastic, etc., making them suitable for different interior decoration styles. By adjusting the angle of the slats, blinds can effectively control the indoor lighting, ventilation, and also protect privacy.

title: Curtain Fabric
detail_text: Contemporary Curtain Solutions: Fabric, Sheer, Blinds, Motorized Remotes, and Rails

title: Water Vapor Fireplace
detail_text: A Water Vapor Fireplace is a type of modern, innovative fireplace that uses water vapor to create a realistic flame effect without the need for real fire or combustion. Instead of burning wood, gas, or other fuels, it uses a combination of water and light to produce an illusion of flames. These fireplaces often use LED lights or plasma technology to project flame-like visuals onto a mist of water vapor, creating the aesthetic of a traditional fire without the heat or emissions.

title: Electric Fireplace
detail_text: An electric fireplace is a type of heating appliance that simulates the appearance of a traditional wood or gas fireplace but uses electricity to create heat and visual effects. These fireplaces do not require ventilation, fuel like wood or gas, or a chimney, making them a convenient and clean alternative to traditional fireplaces.

title: Wood-Burning Fireplace
detail_text: A Wood-Burning Fireplace is a traditional heating device that uses firewood as fuel to generate heat and create a natural flame effect. It provides not only warmth but also a cozy and classic ambiance, making it a popular choice for homes and commercial spaces.

title: Building structure
detail_text: Building structure refers to the main framework and supporting system of a building, responsible for bearing the weight of the building and ensuring its stability, safety, and durability. It is typically made up of various materials such as steel, concrete, wood, etc., and includes the following key components:

title: Transportation Buildings
detail_text: Transportation buildings refer to structures specifically designed to support transportation and transportation facilities. These buildings provide infrastructure for various modes of transport, such as road, rail, water, and air, to ensure smooth and safe movement of passengers, goods, and vehicles. Transportation buildings include facilities not only for passenger services but also for vehicle parking and maintenance.

title: Industrial Buildings
detail_text: Industrial buildings design refers to the process of planning and creating functional, efficient, and safe spaces for industrial activities such as manufacturing, storage, or distribution. These buildings are typically designed to accommodate machinery, large equipment, high volumes of materials, and personnel, while also meeting safety regulations and energy efficiency standards.

title: Commercial Buildings
detail_text: Commercial buildings refer to buildings that are used for business, office, retail, service, and other commercial activities. The primary purpose of these buildings is to provide space for businesses, merchants, or service providers to operate, whether for office work, sales, customer service, or other commercial activities. Commercial buildings range from small retail stores to large office towers and shopping malls.

title: Residential Buildings
detail_text: Residential buildings refer to structures specifically designed for living purposes, intended to provide space for individuals, families, or groups to reside. These buildings serve as the primary unit for everyday human living, ranging from individual houses to high-rise apartments. The design of residential buildings typically focuses on comfort, safety, privacy, and functionality to meet the basic needs of residents.

title: Greening Design
detail_text: Greening Design refers to a design approach that integrates environmental protection and sustainability principles in architecture, urban planning, and landscape design. It aims to reduce resource consumption, lower environmental pollution, improve the ecological environment, and enhance the quality of life by incorporating green elements and technologies. The goal is to create healthier, more environmentally friendly, and sustainable spaces through green buildings, energy conservation, reduced waste, and low pollution measures.

title: Container House
detail_text: A Container House is a type of home built using shipping containers as the primary structural material. These homes are an innovative, cost-effective, and sustainable alternative to traditional housing. Shipping containers, typically made from steel, are repurposed to create living spaces, and they can be stacked, combined, or modified to fit various designs and sizes.

title: Space Capsule House
detail_text: Stable Structure, Efficient Use，Appearance and Design，Versatility and Environmental Friendliness，Technological Facilities....

title: Wardrobe Accessories
detail_text: Wardrobe accessories are components that enhance the functionality, organization, and aesthetics of wardrobes. They help optimize space, improve organization, and make it easier to store and access clothing and accessories.

title: Modern wardrobe walkin closet
detail_text: Designing Luxury: Modern, Minimalist, and Classic Walk-In Closets with Premium Accessories

title: Colorful Stone Coated Metal
detail_text: Colorful Stone Coated Metal is a building material that combines metal sheets with a colorful stone granule coating, typically used for roofing.

title: PVC Roof Tiles
detail_text: PVC Roof Tiles are roofing tiles made from polyvinyl chloride (PVC) material. They are commonly used for roofing and exterior decoration due to their excellent durability, lightweight nature, and wind resistance.

title: Asphalt Shingles
detail_text: Asphalt Shingles are a type of roofing material commonly used on roofs of residential, commercial, and other buildings. They are made from a layer or multiple layers of asphalt, mineral granules, and fiberglass. Asphalt shingles are known for their waterproof, fire-resistant, and weather-resistant properties.

title: Stone Staircase
detail_text: A stone staircase is a type of staircase made from natural or artificial stone, commonly used in residential buildings, commercial spaces, villas, hotels, and other high-end locations. Stone staircases are favored for their elegant appearance, durability, and premium quality.

title: Glass Staircase
detail_text: A glass staircase is a type of staircase primarily made of glass, combined with metal or wood components, and is widely used in modern residential buildings, commercial spaces, office buildings, hotels, and luxury villas. Glass staircases are popular in modern architecture and interior design for their stylish, transparent, and high-end visual appeal.

title: Metal Staircase
detail_text: A metal staircase is a type of staircase primarily made from metal materials such as steel, aluminum, stainless steel, or iron. It is widely used in residential, commercial, industrial, and public buildings.

title: Wooden Staircase
detail_text: A wooden staircase is a staircase primarily made from wood, widely used in residential, commercial spaces, and public buildings. Wooden staircases are favored for their natural beauty, warm feel, and durability, making them a classic choice in both traditional and modern home designs.

title: Fence Main Gate
detail_text: A Fence Main Gate refers to the primary entryway in a fence system, typically located at the center or a prominent position of the fence. It serves as the main point of access while also providing security and privacy for the enclosed area.

title: Cast Aluminum Door
detail_text: A Cast Aluminum Door is a door made primarily of cast aluminum alloy material, which combines strength, durability, and aesthetic appeal. It is commonly used in high-end residential properties, villas, luxury apartments, and more.

title: French Door
detail_text: A French door is a type of door design characterized by its double door configuration, typically made of glass panes that extend the full length of the door. French doors are often used to connect interior spaces with the outside (such as patios or gardens) or between rooms to allow for more natural light and a feeling of openness.

title: Folding Door
detail_text: A folding door, also known as a bi-fold door, is a type of door system that consists of multiple panels that fold back upon themselves when opened. This design allows the door to be fully opened to provide a wider opening compared to traditional hinged doors, making it a popular choice for spaces that require flexibility and efficient use of space.

title: Sliding Door
detail_text: A sliding door is a type of door that opens by sliding horizontally along a track, rather than swinging open on hinges. This design saves space and provides a modern, sleek look, making sliding doors a popular choice for both residential and commercial properties.

title: Plywood Wood Door
detail_text: A plywood wood door is a type of door made using plywood, an engineered wood product made by gluing together thin layers or plies of wood veneer. These layers are arranged so that the grain of each ply is oriented perpendicular to the adjacent layers, creating a strong and durable material. Plywood doors are commonly used in both residential and commercial applications due to their strength, versatility, and cost-effectiveness.

title: Wpc Door
detail_text: A WPC door refers to a Wood Plastic Composite door, which is made from a blend of wood fibers and plastic materials, resulting in a durable, moisture-resistant, and eco-friendly product. WPC doors are increasingly popular in modern architecture and interior design due to their unique blend of strength, aesthetics, and sustainability.

title: Veneer Wood Door
detail_text: A veneer wood door is a type of door made from a thin layer of natural wood (called veneer) applied over a core material such as plywood, MDF (medium-density fiberboard), or solid wood. The veneer layer gives the door the appearance of a solid wood door while being more cost-effective and lightweight.

title: HDF Wooden Door
detail_text: An HDF wooden door (High-Density Fiberboard wooden door) is a type of door made from HDF, which is a type of engineered wood product. HDF is denser and stronger than MDF (Medium-Density Fiberboard) and is commonly used in doors, furniture, and cabinetry because of its smooth surface and durability.

title: Eco-friendly Door
detail_text: Eco-friendly doors are door products that emphasize environmental protection and health.

title: Door Handle Accessories
detail_text: Door handles are not only essential for opening and closing doors but also serve as a stylish accent to your interior design. We offer a wide range of door handles made from materials such as stainless steel, zinc alloy, aluminum alloy, and brass to suit various design styles—from modern minimalism and vintage elegance to industrial aesthetics.

title: Elevating Work Platform
detail_text: An Elevating Work Platform (EWP) is a piece of equipment designed for high-altitude work, providing a stable platform that allows workers to perform tasks such as maintenance, installation, or other high-level operations safely. These platforms can be raised or lowered vertically or horizontally, and they are widely used in industries like construction, maintenance, electrical work, and warehousing.

title: Panoramic Elevator
detail_text: A panoramic elevator, also known as a glass elevator or scenic elevator, is a type of elevator designed with transparent walls, often made of glass, to offer passengers a panoramic view as they travel between floors. These elevators are commonly found in buildings or locations where aesthetics, design, and a unique experience are important, such as in high-rise buildings, shopping malls, observation towers, or tourist attractions.

title: Escalator
detail_text: An escalator is a moving staircase that is designed to transport people between different floors of a building or structure. It consists of a continuous loop of steps that move up or down, typically powered by an electric motor. Escalators are commonly found in places with high foot traffic, such as shopping malls, airports, subway stations, department stores, and office buildings.

title: Home Elevator / Villa Elevator
detail_text: A home elevator is a vertical transportation system designed for residential use, offering convenience, accessibility, and luxury. It can be an excellent addition to homes with multiple floors, making it easier for people to move between levels, especially for those with mobility issues.

title: Hospital Elevator
detail_text: A hospital elevator is a type of elevator designed specifically for use in medical facilities such as hospitals, clinics, and healthcare centers. These elevators are built to accommodate the unique requirements of medical environments, ensuring safe, efficient, and accessible transportation of patients, medical staff, equipment, and visitors between different floors.

title: CCTV
detail_text: Hikvision: A global leader in video surveillance equipment, focusing on video monitoring as the core, with strong intelligence and innovation. Dahua: Focuses on providing comprehensive security solutions, continuously innovating in AI and smart video surveillance, playing a key role in the industry.

title: Generator
detail_text: A generator is a device that converts mechanical energy into electrical energy. It is widely used in homes, industries, businesses, construction sites, hospitals, and data centers.

title: Home Theater
detail_text: Home Theater refers to a system or setup within a home that aims to replicate the experience of a movie theater, providing a high-quality audio and visual experience. It typically includes a large display, surround sound system, and comfortable seating, all designed to create an immersive environment for watching movies, TV shows, or enjoying music.

title: Massage Chair
detail_text: A Massage Chair is a type of furniture designed to provide automated massage treatments to the user. It simulates the techniques of a professional massage therapist, offering various functions such as kneading, tapping, rolling, and shiatsu to relieve tension, improve circulation, and promote relaxation.

title: Pool Table / Table Soccer / Air Hockey Table
detail_text: A pool table is a rectangular surface used for playing pool or billiards. It is typically covered with felt and has six pockets, with the goal of sinking balls into these pockets using a cue stick. Pool tables vary in size, with common dimensions being 7, 8, or 9 feet. They are often used in homes, bars, and recreational areas, providing entertainment for players of all skill levels. There are different types of games played on a pool table, such as 8-ball, 9-ball, and straight pool, each with its own set of rules and strategies.

title: PS5
detail_text: The Sony PS5 (PlayStation 5) is a next-generation gaming console launched by Sony Interactive Entertainment in 2020. It is the successor to the PlayStation 4 (PS4) and offers enhanced hardware performance, faster load times, and more immersive gaming experiences.

title: Fitness Equipment
detail_text: Fitness equipment can be categorized based on usage scenarios and functions

title: Solar System
detail_text: Photovoltaic solar energy is a technology that converts solar energy into electrical energy, widely used in various scenarios, from residential and industrial power consumption to large-scale solar power plants.
